query.sql: select o.* from act_re_procdef o where (1=1)
query.countsql: select count(o.id_) from act_re_procdef o where (1=1)

query.sql: select o from Test o where (1=1)
query.countsql: select count(o.id) from Test o where (1=1)

query.sql: select o from Test2 o where (1=1) and ((:simple is null or :simple ='') or lower(o.simple) like concat('%',concat(lower(:simple )),'%'))
query.countsql: select count(o.id) from Test2 o where (1=1) and ((:simple is null or :simple ='') or lower(o.simple) like concat('%',concat(lower(:simple )),'%'))

query.sql: select o from Test3 o where (1=1)
query.countsql: select count(o.id) from Test3 o where (1=1)

query.sql: select o from Test4 o where (1=1)
query.countsql: select count(o.id) from Test4 o where (1=1)

query.sql: select o from TaskExt o where (1=1) and (((o.taskType in ('待办','挂起','已领取')) and (o.tqreason is null or o.tqreason!='作废') and ((o.transactor = #userId#))) or ((o.taskType in ('待领取')) and (o.transactorgroups like concat('%',concat(lower(#userId#)),'%'))))
query.countsql: select count(o.id) from TaskExt o where (1=1) and (((o.taskType in ('待办','挂起','已领取')) and (o.tqreason is null or o.tqreason!='作废') and ((o.transactor = #userId#))) or ((o.taskType in ('待领取')) and (o.transactorgroups like concat('%',concat(lower(#userId#)),'%'))))
